about.summary: The main functions perform mixed models analysis by least squares or REML by adding the function r() to formulas of lm() and glm(). A collection of text-book statistics for higher education is also included, e.g. modifications of the functions lm(), glm() and associated summaries from the package 'stats'.

The main functions perform mixed models analysis by least squares or REML by adding the function r() to formulas of lm() and glm(). A collection of text-book statistics for higher education is also included, e.g. modifications of the functions lm(), glm() and associated summaries from the package 'stats'.

name: r-mixlm
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.4.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mixlm
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mixlm_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mixlm/mixlm_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 189e3de090b742b7ece959e5af7963703c372ffcc20e34225cca727c95c06cb7

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-car
    - r-leaps
    - r-multcomp
    - r-pls
    - r-pracma
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-car
    - r-leaps
    - r-multcomp
    - r-pls
    - r-pracma

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('mixlm')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mixlm')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/khliland/mixlm/
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: The main functions perform mixed models analysis by least squares or REML by adding the function r() to formulas of lm() and glm(). A collection of text-book statistics for higher education is also included, e.g. modifications of the functions lm(), glm() and associated summaries from the package 'stats'.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - RJMW

# Package: mixlm
# Type: Package
# Title: Mixed Model ANOVA and Statistics for Education
# Version: 1.2.6
# Date: 2022-02-24
# Authors@R: c(person("Kristian Hovde", "Liland", role = c("aut","cre"), email="kristian.liland@nmbu.no"), person("Solve", "Sb", role=c("ctb")), person(family="R-Core", role="ctb"))
# Maintainer: Kristian Hovde Liland <kristian.liland@nmbu.no>
# Encoding: latin1
# Description: The main functions perform mixed models analysis by least squares or REML by adding the function r() to formulas of lm() and glm(). A collection of text-book statistics for higher education is also included, e.g. modifications of the functions lm(), glm() and associated summaries from the package 'stats'.
# Imports: car, pls, multcomp, pracma, leaps
# Suggests: lme4
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# URL: https://github.com/khliland/mixlm/
